timeline.message: Fixing localization name for left leg
Adding support for late spouse prefix, widow, and divorced
Adding a method to return the children of a person
Moving campaign to have babies generated in Person
Adding TODO to fix the processNewDayPersonnel method in the future
Adding half-siblings and a key list for any sibling enum values
Tearing out ancestors - only migration left
Moving any remaning ancestors usage to be based on an inline migration class in the campaign xml parser
Moving all traces of Ancestors except one call to CampaignXmlParser

timeline.bodyText: I think this is ripe for unit tests, along with removing relations to make sure the tree is pruned.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: And while you're at it, let's put some comments on these public methods, as I don't really have any idea what they do just looking at the name.
replies.author: NickAragua

timeline.bodyText: Let's put a comment on this public method.
timeline.author: NickAragua

timeline.bodyText: Seems like some comments would be helpful for this enum in general.
timeline.author: NickAragua

timeline.message: Implementing JavaDoc comments as per review
Switching Siblings to be determined based on parential children
Fixing checkMutualAncestors and adding unit testing for it
Adding heavy unit testing to Genealogy
